discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment:
Note to @anton-trunov: in addition to the deploy jobs I had included a `ci-lemma-overloading-8.12` test job which failed just because the opam file in lemma-overloading must be updated.
So I'm going to open a PR (from the templates) in the lemma-overloading repo to support `8.12`, but before that one needs to wait that https://github.com/coq/opam-coq-archive/pull/1279 is merged.

discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment: (closing and reopening to relaunch the CI)
